item.title: Daily AI Painting Tip: 3D Gradient Icon Style (GPT-4o & Lovart in Practice)
item.description: This issue of the AI Painting column details how to generate high-quality 3D gradient icons using GPT-4o and Lovart, with detailed prompts and practical tips, suitable for daily advancement of AI artists and UI designers.
